_header: At the beginning of the charterhouse God did show
_description: The Founding of the Carthusian Order — twenty-nine couplets

BLAdd37049.First Lines:
At þe begynyng of þe chartirhows god did
                    schewe…
BLAdd37049.Editions:
Doty,  Brant Lee,
                        ed.  
             “An Edition of British Museum MS Additional 37049: a Religious
                Miscellany.” 
         Diss. Michigan State, 1969: 138-42.
